titleStmt.title: The true tything of the gospel-ministers, or, An answer to an national teacher that sueth an elder of a church for tythes proving that tythes are not to be enforst upon members of true churches ... / by Richard Kingsnoth.
titleStmt.author: Kingsnorth, Richard, d. 1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Dawson for Francis Smith,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
